Title: Allows real property tax freeze for real property owned by taxpayers sixty-five or over
Summary: Allows a freeze to be placed upon real property taxes assessed against persons 65 years of age or older having earnings of not more than $32,000 and who have held title to the property for at least two years prior to making an application; requires county to provide notification of those provisions; requires each governing board of any municipal corporation to notify each person owning residential property.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to allowing a real property tax freeze for property owned by certain persons over 65 years of age
